item.title: Sinju HTML Changelog
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: Here is the details changelog of the Sinju HTML Template. If you don’t have the latest version please download it from your account. V1.1.0 (10 June, 2019) ** Gulpfile updated ** Newsletter section added ** Responsive Improved V1.0.0 (06 June, 2019) Initial Release
item.content:encoded:
Here is the details changelog of the Sinju HTML Template. If you don’t have the latest version please download it from your account.


V1.1.0 (10 June, 2019)
** Gulpfile updated
** Newsletter section added
** Responsive Improved


V1.0.0 (06 June, 2019)
Initial Release

item.title: Editing HTML Files
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: Software Required: (For HTML Edit) You can download trial (30 days free) versions by the following links Adobe Dreamweaver (or Microsoft Expression Web) http://www.adobe.com/products/dreamweaver/ or Notepad++ https://notepad-plus-plus.org/download/ or Sublime Text https://www.sublimetext.com or Visual Studio Code https://code.visualstudio.com/ Adobe Photoshop (For Graphics Editing) http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/photoshop/
item.content:encoded:
Software Required: (For HTML Edit)
You can download trial (30 days free) versions by the following links
Adobe Dreamweaver (or Microsoft Expression Web)
http://www.adobe.com/products/dreamweaver/
or
Notepad++
https://notepad-plus-plus.org/download/
or
Sublime Text
https://www.sublimetext.com
or
Visual Studio Code
https://code.visualstudio.com/

Adobe Photoshop (For Graphics Editing)
http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/photoshop/

item.title: Pages

item.description: There following the html files/pages list : 404.html about.html author.html authors.html blog-details.html contact.html guide.html / index2.html index3.html tag.html tags.html

item.title: How to edit Sinju HTML template?
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: We used Gulp, SCSS in our HTML Site template. So that is really developer friendly template. Make sure you have nodejs and git bash in your computer and then install gulp 4.x Please watch that video tutorial to know about the Sinju HTML Site template editing process with gulp. Tagstutorial, video
item.content:encoded:
We used Gulp, SCSS in our HTML Site template. So that is really developer friendly template. Make sure you have nodejs and git bash in your computer and then install gulp 4.x
Please watch that video tutorial to know about the Sinju HTML Site template editing process with gulp.

Tagstutorial, video

item.title: Template Installation
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: In order to make your site “live”, you need to upload specific template files from your local computer to your hosting server. FTP Upload: Open up your FTP manager and connect to your hosting Browse to required directory (Normally public_html) Upload the files inside html folder.
item.content:encoded:
In order to make your site “live”, you need to upload specific template files from your local computer to your hosting server.

FTP Upload:

  • Open up your FTP manager and connect to your hosting
  • Browse to required directory (Normally public_html)
  • Upload the files inside html folder.

item.title: Sinju HTML Introduction
item.dc:creator: John Doe
item.description: Sinju HTML Site Template is a blogging site template to create an personal blog, corporate blog, project blog etc type website. You will get a clean, polished and modern website with Sinju HTML Site Template. It’s a ready website template for any kinds of blog. Sinju HTML Site Template built with bootstrap framework. This theme […]
item.content:encoded:
Sinju HTML Site Template is a blogging site template to create an personal blog, corporate blog, project blog etc type website. You will get a clean, polished and modern website with Sinju HTML Site Template. It’s a ready website template for any kinds of blog.

Sinju HTML Site Template built with bootstrap framework. This theme has all necessary features for a blog website. You will get tons of features in that template. This template has includes the authors and tags page as well.
